participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys exploring various music genres and values artistic expression.
participant_1.background: I bought a soccer ball with my first paycheck. My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites. I like rap music. I'm allergic to apples yet still eat them. My mother raised me by herself while working two jobs.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Warm-hearted and nostalgic, cherishes family time and has ambitions that blend with life's responsibilities.
participant_2.background: I have gray hair but I still love to read to my grandchildren. I secretly want to be a professional athlete, but I know my parents would never approve. I started working for myself so I could be more flexible with my time and still be able to take care of my toddler. I drive a ford mustang. I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.

content.text: What's your favorite kind of music to listen to?
I'm a big fan of rap music.
Interesting, what do you like about it?
I love the energy and the beats. It's really upbeat and gets me pumped up.
I can see how that would be a good way to start your day. I'm more of a fan of chill music, like jazz or classical.
I can see the appeal in that. I do like to listen to classical music when I'm working.
Yeah, it's definitely good for concentration.
Do you have any favorite artists?
I'm a big fan of Kendrick Lamar and J. Cole.
I like them both too! Have you heard of Childish Gambino?
Yeah, I've heard of him. I've only listened to a few of his songs, but I like what I've heard.
He's really good. I think you'd like his music.
I'll have to check him out.
